scenario_text.value:
Would you look at those flowers!
How wonderful...

Hey, did you know, Aoi? They say there’s
a dead body under every cherry blossom tree—
I don’t want to hear about that right now!

I’d rather we head toward the historic
landmark, if we could.

Everyone went this way... Looks pretty rocky
up that <color=#B41919>path</color>, huh? What a pain...

(It was a normal conversation on a normal day
with friends...)
(Well, normal other than the camping part.)
